mapper.update: update tbl_reservation set status = case status when 'onapply' then 'loanrejected' when 'onres' then 'onapplyready' end where bno = #{bno} and rno >= #{rno} and status != 'cancel' order by rno limit 2;

update tbl_reservation set status = case status when 'onapplyready' then 'cancel' when 'onres' then 'onapplyready' end where bno = #{bno} and rno >= #{rno} and status != 'cancel' order by rno limit 2;
